titles.title: Water Resources Technical Assistance Review Act
Water Resources Technical Assistance Review Act
Water Resources Technical Assistance Review Act
Water Resources Technical Assistance Review Act
Water Resources Technical Assistance Review Act
To require the Comptroller General of the United States to review all clean water-related technical assistance authorities of the Environmental Protection Agency, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held
Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment Discharged
Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 61 - 3.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 119-275.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 231.

action.text: Mr. Taylor moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3427.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Discharged, Referred To
